item.title: Mindworks Psychology
item.dc:creator: Brent Lagerman
item.description:
For the identity of Mindworks we wanted to create a minimal logo with the hidden forms of a M and W Contrast the sharp architectural traditional lines with a bright color scheme and you have a winner Let’s move out from the topic, your engagement was extra special, your wedding was beautiful and your soul […]

The post Mindworks Psychology appeared first on mimoYmima.
item.content:encoded:
For the identity of Mindworks we wanted to create a minimal logo with the hidden forms of a M and W

Contrast the sharp architectural traditional lines with a bright color scheme and you have a winner

Let’s move out from the topic, your engagement was extra special, your wedding was beautiful and your soul mate is one-of-a-kind. Now it is time for your honeymoon. While it has been a blast sharing all the special moments up to this point with your family and friends, your honeymoon represents time you get to spend with your husband or wife, just the two of you. You have chosen to book a romantic honeymoon cabin. What all do you need to know? Be enlightened by reading 5 Tips for Booking a Anniversary Cabin.

The post Mindworks Psychology appeared first on mimoYmima.

item.title: Identity: CNC
item.dc:creator: Brent Lagerman
item.description:
We're going international - we just completed a branding project for CNC, an educational consulting company based in South Korea. They work with Korean and Chinese students who want to study in American high schools or universities.

The post Identity: CNC appeared first on mimoYmima.
item.content:encoded:
We’re going international – we just completed a branding project for CNC, an educational consulting company based in South Korea. Moreover, the reported average quality of child care center in the US falls short of the standards recommended by early childhood professionals, 3-6 leading to concerns about how the quality of such environments affects childrenâ€™s development.

They work with Brooksfield School Pre K who want to study in American high schools or universities. It was important to them that their brand would be appealing to a broad range of people – from the parents who book their services to the universities in the US or the students themselves. We worked in a clever playful element with the duality of the graphic – a paper airplane and a traditional pencil in one. It sums up what CNC does.

Even though we mostly work with NYC-based businesses, thanks to Skype we can work with businesses that, like CNC, are beginning their work day when we’re wrapping up ours.

The post Identity: CNC appeared first on mimoYmima.

item.title: Eye Shoppe on Seventh
item.dc:creator: Brent Lagerman
item.description:
We're creating the identity for Eye Shoppe on Seventh. Some directions we're exploring include French script, clean/modern, and quirky/bold. It's a work in progress, so check back here for more updates soon.

The post Eye Shoppe on Seventh appeared first on mimoYmima.
item.content:encoded:
The Eye Shoppe has been on Seventh Ave in Park Slope since 1991, we wanted to show a little bit of that history in the website design, so we borrowed inspiration from their beautiful tin ceiling.

What a fantastic group…..they designed our business website and logo and I couldn’t be happier. They worked with me personally to get it right, and it came out great! From the initial idea to inception they were a call away, and even helped me with marketing ideas! I totally recommend them! Thanks guys!

â€“ Richie Livan


The images below show the process we went through to develop their new identity and logo.

Chosen Color Scheme

Color

Concepts

Here’s a few of the other directions we explored: French script, clean modern, and quirky/bold.

The post Eye Shoppe on Seventh appeared first on mimoYmima.

item.title: Cator Social Media
item.dc:creator: Brent Lagerman
item.description:
We recently created the identity work for Cator Social Media, we're really excited with how it came out, it's colorful, bright, and it communicates.

The post Cator Social Media appeared first on mimoYmima.
item.content:encoded:
Logo Mark with color

We created a visual identity for CATOR Social Media that feels modern and fun. The founder, ThÃ©rÃ¨se Cator, has a very outgoing personality and makes you smile every time you talk to her, so we wanted her identity to match that vibe. She likes buying YouTube subscribers for her account so more people can get to know her and see her videos. Just a quick tip for starter youtubers, you can buy views on youtube here to achieve a high level of recognition instantly.

catorsocialmedia.com

The post Cator Social Media appeared first on mimoYmima.

item.title: Page Clements Voice Coach
item.dc:creator: Brent Lagerman
item.description:
Logo design for Page Clements Vocal Instruction DVDs for actors

The post Page Clements Voice Coach appeared first on mimoYmima.
item.content:encoded:
Logo choices for a voice coaching DVD

We created the identity and website design for a voice coaching DVD featuring Page Clements. Page is a voice coach specializing in vocal warmups and exercises for actors. We wanted the logo to resonated with a younger audience, it’s personality is very welcoming and just looks vocally interesting.

Revision 02 of chosen mark

Revision 01 of chosen mark

Logo Concepts

The post Page Clements Voice Coach appeared first on mimoYmima.

item.content:encoded:

We’re starting up the identity and website for the Williamsburg Movement And Arts Center. This is not just a dance studio: there’s circus arts, acting lessons, zumba… Lots of creative and movement courses for both kids and adults. We’ll post more updates here soon, bookmark it!
